high_descs: Turn left and walk straight ahead to the counter.
Pick up the knife on the counter.
Place the knife in the sink.
anns.task_desc: Place a knife in a sink.

high_descs: Walk forward, then hang a left and walk over to the counter.
Pick up the large metal knife off of the counter to the left of the oven.
Walk over to the kitchen sink.
Put the metal knife into the sink basin handle up.
anns.task_desc: Put a large metal knife in the sink.

high_descs: Turn left, go across room to counter between stove and refrigerator.
Pick up knife to the right of the egg.
Turn right and proceed to sink on your left.
Stand up knife in sink to your left.
anns.task_desc: Move knife from counter to sink.
